Cities

Travelmath provides a database of major and local cities around the world. You can find the latitude and longitude of any world city, and check the city distance by comparing the flight distance between cities with the driving distance to see how far two cities are from each other. You can also figure out the time change if you're moving to a new city, or browse other cities in the surrounding area if you're planning a road trip. If you're traveling overseas, look up all the major cities in any country to find the best places to travel on your next vacation.
